name: Scrum-A-Lot
description:
This plugin provides you with a few different options of estimation schemes:


  • Fibonacci I (0, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, 21)
  • Fibonacci II (0, 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, 21)
  • T-Shirt Sizes (XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL)
  • Power of Two (0, 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64)
  • Emoji (not sure what this is supposed to be either)


How to use Scrum-A-Lot

  1. Install Scrum-A-Lot
  2. Create a FigJam file and invite all team members that are supposed to take part in the estimation session (this is important. There are a few restrictions in FigJam that prevent us from adding new team members on the fly)
  3. Add a Scrum-A-Lot story
  4. Titles and descriptions are a great way to make sure that even people who muted the team manager know what to estimate
  5. Choose an estimation scheme
  6. Hit the button "Vote", pick an option and press submit
  7. As soon as everyone made their choice press reveal and voil√°: democracy (well, no)
